segments.text: Observing this kitchen, the open window lets in a nice view of the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is focused on drying that plate with her towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's running wild, overflowing into a nasty puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's dripping down the cabinets, ruining the wood probably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the mess, and she doesn't even flinchâ€”gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are filthy with their cookie heist on that dirty stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand is deep in the jar, grabbing treats like a thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just standing there, but the whole thing is sneaky and messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water on the floor will make it slippery and unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside looks pristine, but inside it's turning into a swamp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such carelessness with hygiene and safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This overflow is just begging for mold or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ugh, someone needs to clean this up immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR
